reviewText: This is the kind of movie that really puts you in a great mood. It is fun and light hearted. I highly recommend.
Title: The Christmas Card/A Grandpa For Christmas

reviewText: Both of the movies are inspirational and reflect the true meaning of Christmas.  The Christmas Card was on our stations infrequently during the holiday but Grandpa for Christmas was never on.  This was a good deal.
Title: The Christmas Card/A Grandpa For Christmas

reviewText: I saw A Grandpa For Christmas on cable and really liked it.  I ordered this so that I would be able to watch it whenever I wanted to.  The other movie is good too.  These movies are great Holiday fare and will surely become classics in time.
Title: The Christmas Card/A Grandpa For Christmas

reviewText: The Christmas Card is a cute movie. Support our troops!  Have not watched "Grandpa for Christmas" yet? 3 more words
Title: The Christmas Card/A Grandpa For Christmas

reviewText: The Christmas Card is one of my lifetime favorite Christmas movies, endearing in its simplicity, touching in its heartfelt warmth, one I can enjoy with my kids and grandkids.A Grandpa for Christmas is also an excellent movie, which I got for my wife, also one to be watched and enjoyed with the kids and grandkids.
Title: The Christmas Card/A Grandpa For Christmas

reviewText: These are 2 very good Christmas movies at one great price! We love Christmas movies all year around here and these are super!
Title: The Christmas Card/A Grandpa For Christmas
